name: 7th International Conference on Advanced Research in Social Sciences
content: The 7th International Conference on Advanced Research in Social Sciences (ICARSS) invites members of academia, scholars, and researchers to Cambridge – the United Kingdom on 07 – 09 of June 2024\. Join social sciences conference as we explore the latest trends in the field of social sciences and discuss common challenges in the areas of politics, law, education, humanities, culture studies, society, and sociology. Immerse yourself in the pool of knowledge and share your research findings with the international network.
